text: Golden Dreams (, translit. Khab-ha-ye Talayi) is a 1951 Iranian comedy film directed by Moezzodivan Fekri.Issari p.268 ==Cast== * Iran Daftari * Moezzodivan Fekri * Ahmad Ghadakchian * Majid Mohseni * Shahla Riahi == References == == Bibliography == * Mohammad Ali Issari. Cinema in Iran, 1900-1979. title: Golden Dreams (1951 film)
